name: [V3 Final]Artist: Hiten | Hiten artist's painting style
description:
Hiten Style LoRA V3

中文 | English 使用前阅读 | Read before use

--

最终版本，这个模型以后不会再更新。

Final version, this model will not be updated in the future.

主要针对技法进行训练。

Mainly for the training of painting techniques.

--

仿Hiten的作画风格的LoRA模型。

权重建议值：1 (or 0.5~1.2)

基于模型：AnythingV5RE

训练信息：共计450张原画(含裁剪图)，迭代1350步。

拟合比率：

  • 肢体拟合：15%

  • 人物拟合：25%

  • 构图拟合：20%

  • 技法拟合：135%

其他的一些建议：EasyNegative。此外，万一畸形四肢换个种子重画就行。

The LoRA model mimics Hiten's painting style.

Recommended weight value: 1 (or 0.5~1.2)

Based on model: AnythingV5RE

Training information: A total of 450 paintings (including cropped images) with 1350 iterations.

Fitting ratio:

  • Motion fitting: 15%

  • Character fitting: 25%

  • Composition fitting: 20%

  • Technique fitting: 135%

Other recommendations: EasyNegative. Moreover, in case of distorted limbs, try starting over with a different seed.

--

题外话和互动环节

请访问：[V3 Final]Artist: mignon | Mignon artist's painting style - v3.0 | Stable Diffusion LoRA | Civitai

Digression & Interaction

Please visit: [V3 Final]Artist: mignon | Mignon artist's painting style - v3.0 | Stable Diffusion LoRA | Civitai

--

任何问题，欢迎反馈。如果你创作出了好作品，欢迎分享它。如果它无法满足你的需求，我是说，我的朋友，请不要给出一星好评。

Any problems, please feel free to give feedback. If you've created something good, feel free to share it. If it doesn't meet your needs, I mean, my friend, please don't give a one-star 'praise'.
